title: Google\Cloud\Retail\V2\Audience
name: Audience
description:
An intended audience of the [Product][google.cloud.retail.v2.Product] for whom it's sold.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.retail.v2.Audience

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.genders
params.description: The genders of the audience. Strongly encouraged to use the standard values: "male", "female", "unisex". At most 5 values are allowed. Each value must be a UTF-8 encoded string with a length limit of 128 characters. Otherwise, an INVALID_ARGUMENT error is returned. Google Merchant Center property gender. Schema.org property Product.audience.suggestedGender.

params.name: data.age_groups
params.description: The age groups of the audience. Strongly encouraged to use the standard values: "newborn" (up to 3 months old), "infant" (3–12 months old), "toddler" (1–5 years old), "kids" (5–13 years old), "adult" (typically teens or older). At most 5 values are allowed. Each value must be a UTF-8 encoded string with a length limit of 128 characters. Otherwise, an INVALID_ARGUMENT error is returned. Google Merchant Center property age_group. Schema.org property Product.audience.suggestedMinAge and Product.audience.suggestedMaxAge.
